code: if (interactive()) {   # Needs at least 1 minute.   pack(     app_name = "myapp",     electron_settings = list(       c("product_name_template", "My Own Product Name"),       c("app_description_template", "App Description"),       c("author_name_template", "Author Name"),       c("author_email_template", "Author E-mail"),       c("repository_url_template", "Repository URL")     ),     option = list()   ) }
